Description.message: Skip sponsorships, annoying advertisements and more on Spotify podcasts. Report sponsors on episodes you listen to and save others' time.

400.message: Server said this request was invalid.

409.message: This has already been submitted before.

segmentListDefaultTab.message: Default tab in segment list popup

hitGoBack.message: Hit unskip to get to where you came from.

confirmMSG.message: To edit or delete individual values, click the info button or open the extension popup by clicking the extension icon in the top right corner.

clearThis.message: Are you sure you want to clear this?

Unknown.message: There was an error submitting your sponsor times, please try again later.

sponsorFound.message: This episode has segments in the database!

serverDown.message: It seems the server is down. Contact the dev immediately.

connectionError.description: Appears in the popup above the refresh button if an error occurred when attempting to send a request. The error code or message will be appended below this string.

submitCheck.message: Are you sure you want to submit this?

submissionEditHint.message: Section editing will appear after you click submit
submissionEditHint.description: Appears in the popup to inform them that editing has been moved to the media player.

popupHint.message: Hint: You can setup keybinds for submitting in the options

expandChapters.description: {0} is replaced by a number. Always more than 1. Example: Show 3 inner chapters

hideButtonsDescription.message: This hides the buttons that appear on the Spotify player to submit skip segments.

showSkipButton.message: Keep skip to highlight button on player

showInfoButton.message: Show info button on Spotify player

showDeleteButton.message: Show delete button on Spotify player

whatViewTracking.message: This feature tracks which segments you have skipped to let users know how much their submission has helped others and used as a metric along with upvotes to ensure that spam doesn't get into the database. The extension sends a message to the server each time you skip a segment. Hopefully most people don't change this setting so that the view numbers are accurate. :)

enableViewTrackingInPrivate.message: Enable skip count tracking in private/incognito tabs

whatTrackDownvotes.message: Any segments you downvote will remain hidden even after refreshing

trackDownvotesWarning.message: Warning: Disabling this will delete all previously stored downvotes

enableTrackDownvotesInPrivate.message: Store segment downvotes in private/incognito tabs

whatQueryByHashPrefix.message: Instead of requesting segments from the server using the videoID, the first 4 characters of the hash of the videoID are sent. This server will send back data for all episodes with similar hashes.

enableShowCategoryWithoutPermission.message: Show categories in submission menu even without submission permission

whatShowCategoryWithoutPermission.message: Some categories require permission to submit due to minimum reputation requirements

showSkipNotice.message: Show notice after a segment is skipped

showUpcomingNotice.message: Show notice before a segment starts

noticeVisibilityMode1.message: Small skip notices for auto skip

noticeVisibilityMode3.message: Faded skip notices for auto skip

longDescription.message: Spot SponsorBlock lets you skip over sponsors, intros, outros, advertisments, and other annoying parts of Spotify podcasts. Spot SponsorBlock is a crowdsourced browser extension that lets anyone submit the start and end times of sponsored segments and other segments of Spotify Podcasts. Once one person submits this information, everyone else with this extension will skip right over the sponsored segment.
longDescription.description: Full description of the extension on the store pages.

noticeUpdate.description: The first line of the message displayed after the notice was upgraded.

noticeUpdate2.message: If you still don't like it, hit the never show button.
noticeUpdate2.description: The second line of the message displayed after the notice was upgraded.

keybindDescription.message: Select a key by typing it and choose any modifier keys you wish to use.

0.message: Connection Timeout. Check your internet connection. If your internet is working, the server is probably overloaded or down.

yourWork.description: Used to describe the section that will show you the statistics from your submissions.

502.message: The server seems to be overloaded. Try again in a few seconds.

errorCode.description: Used as an error message for HTTP errors returned by the server. {code} will be replaced by the status code. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_status_code

full.description: Used for the name of the option to label an entire episode as sponsor or self promotion.

skip_to_category.description: Used for skipping to things (Skip to Highlight)

skipped_to_category.description: Used for skipping to things (Skipped to Highlight)

audioNotificationDescription.message: Audio notification on skip will play a sound whenever a segment is skipped. If disabled (or auto skip is disabled), no sound will be played.

showTimeWithSkipsDescription.message: This time appears in brackets next to the current time that is next to the Seek Bar. This shows the total episode duration minus any segments. This includes segments marked as only "Show In Seek Bar".

youHaveSavedTime.description: You've saved people from 887,362 segments (236d 15h 5.3 minutes of their lives).

youHaveSavedTimeEnd.description: You've saved people from 887,362 segments (236d 15h 5.3 minutes of their lives).

whatChangeUserID.message: This should be kept private. This is like a password and should not be shared with anyone. If someone has this, they can impersonate you. If you are looking for your public userID, click the clipboard icon in the popup.

userIDChangeWarning.message: Warning: Changing the Private UserID is permanent. Are you sure you would like to do this? Make sure to backup your old one just in case.

optionsInfo.message: Disable auto skip, hide buttons and more.

minDurationDescription.message: Segments shorter than the set value will not be skipped or show in the player.

enableManualSkipOnFullVideo.message: Use manual skip when a full episode label exists

whatManualSkipOnFullVideo.message: For people who want to listen to the episode uninterrupted if it is fully sponsored or self promotion.

skipNoticeDurationDescription.message: The skip notice will stay on screen for at least this many seconds. For manual skipping, it may be visible for longer.

shortCheck.message: The following submission is shorter than your minimum duration option. This could mean that this is already submitted, and just being ignored due to this option. Are you sure you would like to submit?

customServerAddressDescription.message:
The address Spot SponsorBlock uses to make calls to the server.
Unless you have your own server instance, this should not be changed.

dataFetchingServerAddressDescription.message:
The address used to make calls to the data fetching server.
Unless you have your own server instance, this should not be changed.

customAddressError.message: This address is not in the right form. Make sure you have http:// or https:// at the beginning and no trailing slashes.

areYouSureReset.message: Are you sure you would like to reset this?

whatExportOptions.message: This is your entire configuration in JSON. This includes your Private UserID, so be sure to share this wisely.

exportOptionsWarning.message: Warning: Changing the options is permanent and can break your install. Are you sure you would like to do this? Make sure to backup your old one just in case.

incorrectlyFormattedOptions.message: This JSON is not formatted correctly. Your options have not been changed.

copyDebugInformationOptions.message: Copies information to the clipboard to be provided to a developer when raising a bug / when a developer requests it. Sensitive information such as your user ID, whitelisted shows, and custom server address have been removed. However it does contain information such as your useragent, browser, operating system, and extension version number.

copyDebugInformationComplete.message: The debug information has been copied to the clip board. Feel free to remove any information you would rather not share. Save this in a text file or paste into the bug report.

keyAlreadyUsed.message: This shortcut is bound to another action. Please select a different one.

CopiedExclamation.description: Used after something has been copied to the clipboard. Example: 'Copied!'

generic_guideline2.message: Plays as if nothing was skipped

category_sponsor_description.message: Paid promotion, paid referrals and direct advertisements. Not for self-promotion or free shoutouts to causes/creators/websites/products they like.

category_sponsor_guideline2.message: Not for donations or custom merch

category_selfpromo_description.message: Similar to "sponsor" except for unpaid or self promotion. This includes sections about merchandise, donations, or information about who they collaborated with.

category_selfpromo_guideline2.message: Free shoutouts that don't add to the episode

category_selfpromo_guideline3.message: Not for corporate designed products and merch

category_interaction_description.message: When there is a short reminder to rate, subscribe or follow them in the middle of content. If it is long or about something specific, it should be under self promotion instead.

category_interaction_guideline1.message: Short reminders to rate, share or follow

category_interaction_guideline3.message: Not for general promotion, only calls to action

category_intro_description.message: An interval without actual content. Could be a pause, jingle, intro music. This should not be used for transitions containing information.

category_outro_description.message: Credits or outro music. Not for conclusions with information.

category_preview_description.message: Collection of clips that show what is coming up in in this episode or other episodes in a series where all information is repeated later in the episode.

category_preview_guideline1.message: Clips that appear later, or in a future episode

category_preview_guideline3.message: Not for sections that add additional content

category_hook_description.message: Narrated trailers for the upcoming episode, greetings and goodbyes. This should not skip conclusions with information.

category_hook_guideline1.message: Narrated trailers for the upcoming episode

category_hook_guideline2.message: Greetings and goodbye sections welcoming viewers

category_hook_guideline3.message: Not for sections that add additional content

category_filler_description.message: Tangential scenes or jokes that are not required to understand the main content of the episode. This should not include segments providing context or background details. This is a very aggressive category meant for when you aren't in the mood for "fun".

category_filler_guideline3.message: Not for scenes required to understand the topic

category_poi_highlight_description.message: The part of the episode that most people are looking for. Similar to "Episode starts at x" comments.

category_poi_highlight_guideline1.message: Section most people are looking for

fallbackToDefault.description: Used in the show specific settings to fallback to the default option.

fullVideoSegments.message: Show an icon when an episode is entirely an advertisement
fullVideoSegments.description: Referring to the category pill that is now shown on episodes that are entirely sponsor or entirely selfpromo

fullVideoLabelsOnThumbnails.message: Show labels on episode pages as well
fullVideoLabelsOnThumbnails.description: Referring to the category pill that is shown on episodes that are entirely sponsor or entirely selfpromo on episode or podcast show pages.

previewColor.description: Referring to submissions that have not been sent to the server yet.

skipOption.description: Used on the options page to describe the ways to skip the segment (auto skip, manual, etc.)

advancedSkipNotSaved.message: Syntax error: Your options have not been saved

advancedSkipSettingsHelp.description: Link in advanced skip options to the help page.

whatEnableTestingServer.message: Your submissions and votes WILL NOT COUNT towards the main server. Only use this for testing.

testingServerWarning.message: All submissions and votes WILL NOT COUNT towards the main server while connecting to the test server. Make sure to disable this when you want to make real submissions.

enableThisCategoryFirst.message: To submit segments with the category of "{0}", you must enable it in the options. You will be redirected to the options now.
enableThisCategoryFirst.description: Used when submitting segments to only let them select a certain category if they have it enabled in the options.

poiOnlyOneSegment.message: Warning: This type of segment can have a maximum of one active at a time. Submitting multiple will cause a random one to be shown.

youMustSelectACategory.message: You must select a category for all segments you are submitting!

End.description: Button that skips to the end of a segment

channelDataNotFound.description: This error appears in an alert when they try to whitelist a show and the extension is unable to determine what show they are looking at.
channelDataNotFound.message: Show ID is not loaded yet. This could be caused by changes in the Spotify layout, if you think so, make a comment here:

permissionRequestFailed.message: Permission request failed, did you click deny?

forceChannelCheck.message: Force podcast show check before skipping

whatForceChannelCheck.message: By default, it will skip segments right away before it even knows what the show is. By default, some segments at the start of the episode might be skipped on whitelisted shows. Enabling this option will prevent this but making all skipping have a slight delay as getting the showID can take some time. This delay might be unnoticeable if you have fast internet.

forceChannelCheckPopup.message: Consider Enabling "Force podcast show check before skipping"

harmfulVote.description: Used for chapter segments when the text is harmful/offensive to remove it faster

readTheGuidelines.description: Show the first time they submit or if they are "high risk"

categoryUpdate2.message: Open the options to skip intros, outros, merch, etc.

GotIt.description: Used as the button to dismiss a tooltip

fullVideoTooltipWarning.message: This segment is large. If the whole episode is about one topic, then change from "Skip" to "Full Episode". See the guidelines for more information.

categoryPillTitleText.message: This entire episode is labeled as this category and is too tightly integrated to be able to separate

chapterNameTooltipWarning.message: One of your chapter names is similar to a category. You should use categories when possible instead.

warningChatInfo.message: We noticed you were making some common mistakes. We very much appreciate your work so far, but we strive towards perfection here, so even very small mistakes matter :)

warningError.message: Error when trying to acknowledge warning:

deArrowMessageRecieved.message: You've received a tip from a moderator

supportSponsorBlock.message: Support our development of Spot SponsorBlock

helpPageFeatureDisclaimer.message: Many features are disabled by default. If you want to skip intros, outros, etc., enable them below. You can also hide/show UI elements.

helpPageHowSkippingWorks1.message: All sponsors are submitted by users like you. You can see the list of submitted sponsors in the database by opening the popup in the top right of your browser.

helpPageHowSkippingWorks2.message: Whenever you skip a segment, you will get notice. If the timing seems wrong vote down by clicking downvote! You can also vote in the popup.

helpPageSubmitting1.message: Submitting can be made by clicking the SponsorBlock segment button in the media player.

helpPageSubmitting2.message: Clicking the play button indicates the start of a segment and clicking the stop icon indicates the end. Click the up arrow button to open the submission menu where you can verify your segments by previewing and editing them to be perfect. Precision is important, make sure to read the guidelines before submitting.

helpPageCopyOfDatabase1.message: All submissions are put into the SponsorBlock database, which is publicly released for anyone to use and is available at

helpPageCopyOfDatabase2.message: The source code is freely available. So, even if something happens to me, your submissions are not lost.

CopyDownvoteButtonInfo.message: Downvotes and creates a local copy for you to resubmit

ChangeCategoryTooltip.message: This will instantly apply to your segments

SponsorTimeEditScrollNewFeature.message: Use your mousewheel while hovering over the edit box to quickly adjust the time. Combinations of the ctrl or shift key can be used to fine tune the changes.

categoryPillNewFeature.message: New! See when an episode is entirely sponsored or self-promotion

optionsTabBehavior.description: Appears in Options as a tab header for options related to categories and skipping behavior. To fit inside the button, it should not be longer than ~20-25 characters (depending on their width).

optionsTabInterface.description: Appears in Options as a tab header for options related to GUI and sounds. To fit inside the button, it should not be longer than ~20-25 characters (depending on their width).

optionsTabKeyBinds.description: Appears in Options as a tab header for keybinds. To fit inside the button, it should not be longer than ~20-25 characters (depending on their width).

optionsTabBackup.description: Appears in Options as a tab header for options related to saving/restoring your settings. To fit inside the button, it should not be longer than ~20-25 characters (depending on their width).

optionsTabAdvanced.description: Appears in Options as a tab header for advanced/niche options. To fit inside the button, it should not be longer than ~20-25 characters (depending on their width).

youtubeKeybindWarning.message: This is a built-in Spotify shortcut. Are you sure you want to use it?

confirmResetToDefault.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values? This cannot be undone.

Import.description: Button to initiate importing segments. Appears under the textbox where they paste in the data

hideUpsells.message: Hide options not available without extra payment

unsubmittedSegmentCounts.description: Example: You currently have 12 unsubmitted segments on 5 episodes

unsubmittedSegmentCountsZero.message: You currently have no unsubmitted segments
unsubmittedSegmentCountsZero.description: Replaces 'unsubmittedSegmentCounts' string when there are no unsubmitted segments

unsubmittedSegmentsSingular.description: Example: You currently have 1 *unsubmitted segment* on 1 episode

unsubmittedSegmentsPlural.description: Example: You currently have 12 *unsubmitted segments* on 5 episodes

videosSingular.description: Example: You currently have 3 unsubmitted segments on 1 *episode*

videosPlural.description: Example: You currently have 12 unsubmitted segments on 5 *episodes*

clearUnsubmittedSegments.description: Label for a button in settings

clearUnsubmittedSegmentsConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to clear all your unsubmitted segments?
clearUnsubmittedSegmentsConfirm.description: Confirmation message for the Clear unsubmitted segments button

showUnsubmittedSegments.description: Show/hide button for the unsubmitted segments list

hideUnsubmittedSegments.description: Show/hide button for the unsubmitted segments list

videoID.description: Header of the unsubmitted segments list

segmentCount.description: Header of the unsubmitted segments list

actions.description: Header of the unsubmitted segments list

segmentFetchFailureWarning.message: Warning: The server hasn't responded with segments yet. There might actually be segments in this episode already submitted but you just haven't received them due to issues with the server.

NoticeTimeAfterSkip.description: This is used on the popup to show how much time left. It will look like "5s". The word {seconds} will be replaced, so keep it here. Translations should only change the "s"

FillerWarning.message: Warning: This is an incredibly aggressive category. You most likely will have to unskip stuff, or disable it sometimes. Be warned that many episodes have over 50% or more of the episode skipped! However, remember that there are still specific guidelines to follow when submitting.
FillerWarning.description: Warning that appears when enabling the filler tangent category

chatboxDescription.message: Join on Discord or Matrix to stay in this chat permanently
chatboxDescription.description: Appears on the top of the integrated chatbox

showGuidelineHelp.description: Setting to show a summary of the guidelines on the submission page

termsAgreement.message: By using this extension, you agree to the {privacy-policy} and {terms}

areYouSureDeleteConfig.message: Are you sure you would like to delete this configuration?
areYouSureDeleteConfig.description: Appears when deleting a configuration for show-based settings

ChannelListInstructionsSB.message: Add shows that should use this alternative skip profile by clicking the button in the popup on an episode made by that show. The list of shows will appear below.
ChannelListInstructionsSB.description: Instructions for the show-specific settings feature to configure settings for specific shows

NoConfigurationsSetup.message: No configurations setup yet. Click the button at the top to add a new configuration.
NoConfigurationsSetup.description: Appears when there are no show configurations setup yet on the show-specific settings list page

videoIDWrongWhenSubmittingError.message: Something has gone wrong with the episodeID detection. Please try refreshing before submitting to ensure it gets submitted for the correct episode. If this is happening a lot, please send a report of this along with the other extensions or userscripts you have installed through GitHub or discord

cleanPopup.message: Hide clutter in segment list popup

hideSegmentCreationInPopup.message: Hide segment creation buttons in popup

syncDisabledWarning.message: Warning: Extension storage has been disabled in your browser. Settings will not be saved if you try saving them.

syncDisabledFirefoxSuggestions.message: You can enable it by going to about:config and setting the value of "webextensions.storage.sync.enabled" to true.

storageFull.message: Extension storage is full. Please delete some unsubmitted segments in the options.

previewSegmentRequired.message: Please preview your segments before submitting. You can do this by clicking the preview button or using the following shortcut:
previewSegmentRequired.description: Appears when trying to submit a segment without previewing it first. After the colon, the shortcut will appear

actAsVip.description: Toggle switch for VIP (SponsorBlock moderators) to be able to make vote actions without using their powers.

votes.description: Appears as `5 votes`. Do not change the {0}

vote.description: Appears as `1 vote`. Do not change the {0}

hookNewFeature.message: Notice: Hook has been moved from the Preview/Recap category to the new Hook/Greetings category
hookNewFeature.description: The category definition has changed, this notice let's people know when they are submitting.

segmentHideFailed.message: Failed to permanently hide/unhide the requested segment, as the segment's UUID could not be resolved:
segmentHideFailed.description: This message is shown when a segment could not be hidden because a request to resolve the segment's UUID failed. One of the general request error messages will be appended to this message.

skipProfile_forAnHour.description: Option in skip profiles to set this skip profile as the active one for an hour

skipProfile_forThisTab.description: Option in skip profiles to set this skip profile as the active one for this tab

skipProfile_forJustThisVideo.description: Option in skip profiles to set this skip profile as the active one for just this episode

skipProfile_forThisChannel.description: Option in skip profiles to set this skip profile as the active one for this show

clickToNotApplyThisProfile.message: Click to not apply this skip profile

skipProfileBeingOverriddenByHigherPriori.message: This option is being overridden by a higher priority option
skipProfileBeingOverriddenByHigherPriori.description: Appears when a skip profile is not being applied because a higher priority reason is (for one hour replacing for this show)

clickToApplyThisProfile.message: Click to apply this skip profile

selectASkipProfileFirst.description: In skip profile menu in popup when you haven't selected a skip profile to edit yet

WhitelistedChannels.description: Name used when converting old whitelisted shows to skip profiles
